channel.title: ICT on Baki Cakici
channel.description: Recent content in ICT on Baki Cakici

item.title: The Informed Gaze: On the Implications of ICT-Based Surveillance
item.description: Information and communication technologies are not value-neutral.

item.title: Sustainability Through Surveillance: ICT Discourses in Design Documents
item.description: Surveillance translates the traces, and the translations exert new pressures on existing power relations.

item.title: Disease Surveillance Systems
item.description: This thesis presents a method for understanding disease surveillance systems structurally and examines four existing systems.
